meanings: 불사하다 do not decline, act in an unreserved way
immortality, eternal life, 불사하다 (be) immortal, undying, deathless
be ready to, be willing to, be set to

vlive.korean: ITZY와 함께라면 이 한 몸 불사 질러 밤을 불태워 볼게요! But I'll dance the night away if it's with ITZY! 듣기 View video V CREW : [V CREW] 붐보의 서재 - EP. 10 ITZY 미니 앨범 2집 IT'z ME 언박싱🖐🏻 (붐보의 WANNABE는 IT지 뿐이지..🤭❤️)
vlive.english: But I'll dance the night away if it's with ITZY!

examples.korean: I was very angry and ready for a fight. 발음듣기 나는 너무 화가 나서 싸움도 불사할 작정이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was very angry and ready for a fight. 발음

examples.korean: They are prepared to use violence in pursuit of their ends. 발음듣기 그들은 자신들의 목적을 위해서라면 폭력도 불사할 각오가 되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They are prepared to use violence in pursuit of their ends. 발음

examples.korean: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger. (Confucius) 발음듣기 배우기만 하고 생각하지 않으면 얻는 것이 없고, 생각만 하고 배우지 않으면 위태로우니라. (學而不思則罔思而不學則殆 / 학이불사즉망 사이불학즉태) (공자, 공부명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger. (Confucius) 발음

examples.korean: For without belittling the courage with which men have died, we should not forget those acts of courage with which men have lived. (John F. Kennedy) 발음듣기 죽음도 불사하며 죽어간 용사들의 용기를 과소평가하지 않는 것처럼, 우리 또한 용사들이 삶으로 보여준 용맹함을 잊지 말아야 합니다. (존 F. 케네디, 전쟁명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: For without belittling the courage with which men have died, we should not forget those acts of courage with which men have lived. (John F. Kennedy) 발음

examples.korean: Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous. (Confucius) 발음듣기 배우기만 하고 생각하지 않으면 얻는 것이 없고, 생각만 하고 배우지 않으면 위태로우니라. (學而不思則罔 思而不學則殆 / 학이불사즉망 사이불학즉태) (공자, 공부명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous. (Confucius) 발음
